loginPage.title: Te Whakauru ki te Tari Whakahaere

signupPage.title: Tari Rēhitatanga
signupPage.preamble: Me whakakī ngā āpiha e hiahia ana ki te whai wāhi ki ngā mahi i te puka i raro iho nei. He mea nui te noho matatapu.

profilePage.title: Kōnae Āpiha
profilePage.commanderAccessMessage: Kua whakahohetia te urunga rangatira. Kei a koe te mana teitei.

logoutPage.title: Tono Whakatā
logoutPage.preamble: E te āpiha, kua rehitatia tō tono whakatā. Tēnā, whakapūmautia tō wehenga atu i tō tūranga. Ka whakatārewatia tō urunga kia hoki mai rā anō koe.
logoutPage.buttonCancel: WHAKAKORE KA HOKI KI TE MAHI
logoutPage.buttonConfirm: WHAKAPŪMAU I TE TONO KA WEHE I TE TŪRANGA
logoutPage.footer: Me noho matatapu, ahakoa kei te whakatā.

connectionsPage.title: Whatunga o te Whakakotahitanga
connectionsPage.subtitle: Te whakaaturanga o te tūnga o te whatunga āpiha AI. Ka whakaaturia i konei ngā hononga hohe me ngā rerenga raraunga i waenga i ngā iwi.

settingsPage.mainSubtitle: Whirihorahia ō tautuhinga pūkete me tō tono i konei.
